name: Pixel Alienoid
description:
Pixel Alienoid

Watch out! Alien spaceships are invading the Earth! Please, Please! Shoot-em-all, protect our home. Our Earth should not be taken from human by aliens.

This is a game inspired by the famous arcade game - Space Invaders. Everyone knows how to play it and the Single Player mode in  Pixel Alienoid does the similar thing. Wait, what about emphasize cooperation between 2 players while shooting Aliens? Pixel Alienoid introduces this cool idea to both you and your company in Two Players mode. Sharing special weapons, gives your company opportunity getting strong and destroy more Aliens. Covering under the shield, protect both of you under the high strength Alien attack. Preventing Aliens cross your defense and guard the Earth.

Note: I provide Single Player Mode in WebGL version as a preview. Feel free to play the game directly in your Web Browser.

How to Play? Control:

To play Pixel Alienoid in Two Players Mode with your company, download Windows/Mac version below and required at least one game controller.

Alienoids:
  •  EMEROID - Regular spaceship of Alienoids. Easy to destroy, but they are in large numbers. Some of them equipped weapon or carries special drops.
  •  ORBCENTROID - The giant spaceship of Alienoids. Equipped thick armor and protected by glowing magic orb.
  •  SUPPLOID - The transport spaceship of Alienoids. Always carries supply or special weapon. Destroy it and don't miss the drops.
  •  TOUGHOID - The heavy armored spaceship of Alienoids. It is equipped the most advanced armor and alien laser.
  •  SAMUROID - The most intrepid Alienoid. It will dash to you at a fast speed and destroy both you and itself.
Upgrade:
  •  Health: Restore one health if the player's health is less than three.
  •  Machine Gun: Shooting bullets in a super fast rate, makes the player strong than ever.
  •  Shotgun: Shooting multiple bullets at the same time, blows the enemies away.
Special Weapon:
  • Laser: Concentrate powerful energy in a blink, penetrate the targets with a deadly shot.
  •  Bomb: Attack all targets, no enemies can avoid it super power.
  •  Shield: Block attack from the enemies, protect you, as well as your company.
